title: Polemica at the Giro d’Italia: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Force Removal of Umbrail Pass from Stage 16
content:
Race descends into storm of late-hour dramas after peloton votes against Giro d'Italia organizer's original plans for snow-swept stage 16.

Read the full article at Polemica at the Giro d’Italia: Rider Protests, Foul Weather Force Removal of Umbrail Pass from Stage 16 on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
